body_html:
@soumith
Maybe, actually, the error happens after the Caffe network is able to generate some outputs, which means the Caffe network already be initialized completely. The error only happens in the multi-process mode, in a normal function call (without mp.Process), the problem does not happen.

body:
@soumith 
Maybe, actually, the error happens after the Caffe network is able to generate some outputs, which means the Caffe network already be initialized completely. The error only happens in the multi-process mode, in a normal function call (without mp.Process), the problem does not happen.
